Author: slapmyalpaca
Text: You’re gonna fluctuate a lot with your weight while in recovery. You need 3500 calories over your BMR (calories it takes to stay alive) to gain one pound. You going up to 88 might have been water weight/food weight from finally eating enough, and now that it’s dropped you’re seeing a more stable rate of gain.  Or the scales could all be slightly different. That happens as well. Good luck! 😊

Author: mustyday
Text: I read somewhere that once you’re really underweight your body just loses it really easily, without even trying. I don’t know true that is tho 🤷🏻‍♀️
